game.name: Believr Pro Wrestling
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: BPW gives you all the stress of running a wrestling promotion, without the money, the glory, or the safety net.
game.shortDescriptionEn: BPW gives you all the stress of running a wrestling promotion, without the money, the glory, or the safety net.
